title: Ridiculous shipping prices for Riot merch
body: Man theres so many nice things in the riot store, the new KD/A figure, the preorder for the Irelia, the fizz onesie and the KD/A jacket, cool 370 bucks USD for them but what is this ridiculous 220 USD shipping cost? like honestly stuff that s**t the shipping costs almost as much as the product and i remember they ship from their warehouse from when i bought the thresh years ago was only in asia and if i remember the old email, hong kong!

replies.body: It actually costs more than the item you are buying (if you are ordering single items at a time) {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

Iâ€™ll share the response i got.


Hey there,

It's me Hidden Ki from the Merch Team! To give you a bit of extra context, our original goal was to ship items to everyone with a single, low flat fare. Unfortunately it got pretty expensive shipping items like the the Ziggs statue to certain countries. That said, rather than pull the item from the store in those regions, we thought it would be better to leave the item available and increase the shipping rate to those regions.

The countries that are subject to these costs are:

Canada
Mexico
Chile
Korea
Taiwan
Singapore
Australia
New Zealand

I hope this clarifies the cost of the order. Please let me know if you have any other questions or concerns.

Hidden Ki
Billing and Account Support
